resource.chars:
Copy 5th Novr/08
Dear Captain Scott 
Let me thank you for your letter of 3d 
inst. I am glad to have your assurance that the 
circulation of your letter to me has done been without your 
knowledge and against your wishes. I was already aware 
of the divulgence to which you allude and I can only 
hope that it will not in any way complicate matters 
or retard the peaceable settlement which we all so earnestly desire.
Yours truly 
A.G.
